author: samajammin
content:
^It's certainly research vs. development focused. If you're looking for dev work I think Tim's advice to check out client repos is a great starting place.

Here's more lists of various projects in the space by specific programming languages, might be worth exploring: https://ethereum.org/en/developers/docs/programming-languages/
